definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: The doctor gave the sick boy some medicine.
sentences.chinese: 醫生給那個生病的男孩一些內服藥。

sentences.english: She makes sure he eats well and takes his medications.
sentences.chinese: 她還要確保兒子飯喫得香，並按時服藥。

sentences.english: If antiperspirants don't help you the doctor may switch over to Oral Medications.
sentences.chinese: 如果止汗不幫你的醫生可能會切換到口服藥物。

sentences.english: However, before she could re-start she was found dead after a drug overdose.
sentences.chinese: 在夢露重新開始之前，她因服藥過量，被人發現死亡。

sentences.english: Take medication as directed, it provides the best pain control.
sentences.chinese: 遵照指示服藥，如此提供最佳的疼痛控制。

sentences.english: WARNING: Not intended for use by pregnant or nursing women. If you are taking any medications, consult your doctor before use.
sentences.chinese: 孕婦，哺乳期婦女或服藥者，服用前請諮詢醫生。

sentences.english: I'll give you some medicine to take and some ointment to ease the itch.
sentences.chinese: 我給你開一些口服藥和一些止癢的藥膏。

sentences.english: No sooner had the patient taken the drug than she vomited.
sentences.chinese: 風溼痛剛一減輕，醫生就囑咐病人停止服藥。

sentences.english: Does not use the cold water clothing capsule, rests previous half hour to take medicine envies lies down immediately.
sentences.chinese: 不用冷水服膠囊，睡前半小時服藥忌立刻躺下。

sentences.english: You’ll need to know when the child took the medicine last and how much was taken.
sentences.chinese: 對此，您必須知道孩子最後一次服藥的時間和藥量。

sentences.english: Methods and taking detailed notes to be read, "Prescription really explain, " a text.
sentences.chinese: 服藥方法和注意事項必須詳細閱讀《方藥闡真》一文。

sentences.english: Is this for internal use too?
In addition, I will prescribe you some medicine for oral administration.
sentences.chinese: 另外，你還需要服用一些口服藥。

sentences.english: During the past 4 weeks , how often have you used your rescue inhaler or nebulizer medication?
sentences.chinese: 在過去的4周內，你用你用多久霧化吸入或服藥？

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed an oral dose of medicine.
The observation group was treated with micro-needle at scalp hairline region; the control group was administered oral medicine.
sentences.chinese: 觀測組用頭皮髮際區微針法，對照組用口服藥物療法。

definition: to take care of (sb's health)/to nurse
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
